api_list.api_description: Search for board games by name or keyword.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The name or keyword to search for.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of item to search for (e.g., boardgame, boardgameexpansion).

optional_parameters.name: exact
optional_parameters.description: Set to 1 for an exact match.

query: Find information about the board game Catan.
